Appendix C - Keyboard Resources

Summary of the Keyboard Resources

Assembly-Language Summary

Global Variables
KbdTypeThe keyboard type of the most recently used keyboard
Key1TransPointer to key-translation routine (for non-ADB keyboards)
Key2TransPointer to key-translation routine (for non-ADB keyboards)
